body.section: Hierarchy Vaccine is a kind of AdministeredDrug

section.title: Description
section.p: "Contains the identifier of the medical substance/treatment administered.... If the substance administered is a vaccine, CVX codes may be used to code this field...." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-5

stentry.p: See Vaccines Administered (CVX_CDC_NIP) definition for values.
"Contains the identifier of the medical substance/treatment administered.... If the substance administered is a vaccine, CVX codes may be used to code this field...." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXA-5
"Identifies the condition or problem for which the drug/treatment was prescribed." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-20.
